heist_flat_crimenet.base_text: Sometimes you need to take things to the extreme to earn a good payday, and that's exactly what we're doing this time. Enter the building, find the panic room, and then steal the whole god damn room by using a helicopter.$NL;$NL;» Enter the building$NL;» Locate and dismount the panic room$NL;» Lift out the panic room and escape

Enter the building, find the panic room, and then steal the whole god damn room by using a helicopter.$NL;$NL;» Enter the building$NL;» Locate and dismount the panic room$NL;» Lift out the panic room and escape

heist_flat_hl_briefing.base_text: Deep inside the projects there's a fortified building, the headquarters of a local gang running a lucrative drugs operation. In this building there's a panic room bolted to the floor - and inside the panic room there's a fortune in cash. $NL; $NL;Getting into the building is easy, but the panic room is a tougher nut to crack. It'll take days to cut it open, and you don't have that much time. So if you can't get in, how are you going to get to all that money? The answer is simple: steal the whole room.
heist_flat_hl_briefing.loc_text: Deep inside the projects there's a fortified building, the headquarters of a local gang running a lucrative drugs operation. In this building there's a panic room bolted to the floor - and inside the panic room there's a fortune in cash. $NL; $NL;Getting into the building is easy, but the panic room is a tougher nut to crack. It'll take days to cut it open, and you don't have that much time. So if you can't get in, how are you going to get to all that money? The answer is simple: steal the whole room.

hud_heist_cane_mission2.loc_text: Take over Santa's Workshop and convince his elves to keep making presents. Shout at them to encourage them to work.

hud_heist_cane_mission3.base_text: Defend Santa's Workshop while the cops try and steal Christmas! We must meet Santa's quota for the year!
hud_heist_cane_mission3.loc_text: Defend Santa's Workshop while the cops try and steal Christmas! We must meet Santa's quota for the year!

hud_heist_friend_anger_2.base_text: Gather the paintings in a pile. They will make a nice bonfire.

hud_heist_friend_anger_2b.base_text: Put a gas can on the pile of paintings and burn them all.
hud_heist_friend_anger_2b.loc_text: Put a gas can on the pile of paintings and burn them all.

hud_heist_friend_anger_3.base_text: Find some thermite and place it in the bathtub to create a hole. That should surely piss him off!
hud_heist_friend_anger_3.loc_text: Find some thermite and place it in the bathtub to create a hole. That should surely piss him off!

hud_heist_friend_loud_01.base_text: The head of security has a USB stick needed to hack the lock system. Find him, kill him and get the usb stick.
hud_heist_friend_loud_01.loc_text: The head of security has a USB stick needed to hack the lock system. Find him, kill him and get the usb stick.

hud_heist_friend_loud_01_hl.base_text: Get the USB stick from the head of security
hud_heist_friend_loud_01_hl.loc_text: Get the USB stick from the head of security

hud_heist_friend_loud_02.base_text: There's a laptop somewhere on the grounds. Use the USB stick and hack it.
hud_heist_friend_loud_02.loc_text: There's a laptop somewhere on the grounds. Use the USB stick and hack it.

hud_heist_friend_loud_03.base_text: The hacking was interupted. They have an external override. Find it and cut it.
hud_heist_friend_loud_03.loc_text: The hacking was interupted. They have an external override. Find it and cut it.

hud_heist_friend_loud_04b.base_text: You need to open the house up. Find the switch that controls the doors and windows.
hud_heist_friend_loud_04b.loc_text: You need to open the house up. Find the switch that controls the doors and windows.

hud_heist_friend_loud_05.base_text: Defeat Sosa's security in the main hall
hud_heist_friend_loud_05.loc_text: Defeat Sosa's security in the main hall

hud_heist_friend_loud_06.base_text: Kill Ernesto Sosa and his goons.
hud_heist_friend_loud_06.loc_text: Kill Ernesto Sosa and his goons.

hud_heist_friend_loud_07.base_text: The Sosas have a hidden safe under the floor of the office. You want to open that safe. Hook the winches up, one on each side.
hud_heist_friend_loud_07.loc_text: The Sosas have a hidden safe under the floor of the office. You want to open that safe. Hook the winches up, one on each side.

hud_heist_friend_loud_08.base_text: Bring the loot to the escape vehicle
hud_heist_friend_loud_08.loc_text: Bring the loot to the escape vehicle

hud_heist_friend_loud_11.base_text: You can leave now or stay and get more loot, it is up to you.
hud_heist_friend_loud_11.loc_text: You can leave now or stay and get more loot, it is up to you.

hud_heist_friend_loud_12.base_text: You've cleared the place out, it's time to get out of here.
hud_heist_friend_loud_12.loc_text: You've cleared the place out, it's time to get out of here.

hud_heist_friend_stealth_01.base_text: We have a bug planted in the yayo. Rip open all you find.
hud_heist_friend_stealth_01.loc_text: We have a bug planted in the yayo. Rip open all you find.

hud_heist_friend_stealth_02.base_text: We've got the bug from the yayo stash, now hook it up with the phone.
hud_heist_friend_stealth_02.loc_text: We've got the bug from the yayo stash, now hook it up with the phone.

hud_heist_friend_stealth_02_hl.base_text: Connect the mic recorder to the phone
hud_heist_friend_stealth_02_hl.loc_text: Connect the mic recorder to the phone

hud_heist_friend_stealth_03.base_text: The mic recorder is hooked up. Call Ernesto Sosa in his office.
hud_heist_friend_stealth_03.loc_text: The mic recorder is hooked up. Call Ernesto Sosa in his office.

hud_heist_friend_stealth_04.base_text: You can't just knock and walk in, so make your way to the office and pick the lock on the door.
hud_heist_friend_stealth_04.loc_text: You can't just knock and walk in, so make your way to the office and pick the lock on the door.

hud_heist_friend_stealth_06.base_text: There should be a button somewhere to open the hidden safe. It'll be hidden, so try moving or rotating vases or other obejcts.
hud_heist_friend_stealth_06.loc_text: There should be a button somewhere to open the hidden safe. It'll be hidden, so try moving or rotating vases or other obejcts.

hud_heist_help_loud_01.base_text: No one likes prisons, but there's something that is different about this one. Time to find out what.
hud_heist_help_loud_01.loc_text: No one likes prisons, but there's something that is different about this one. Time to find out what.

hud_heist_help_loud_02.base_text: You have been challenged to spin the wheel of misfortune. Do you dare!?
hud_heist_help_loud_02.loc_text: You have been challenged to spin the wheel of misfortune. Do you dare!?

hud_heist_help_loud_03.base_text: Defend the wheel, don't let anyone disable it or there will be a penalty!
hud_heist_help_loud_03.loc_text: Defend the wheel, don't let anyone disable it or there will be a penalty!

hud_heist_help_loud_04.base_text: The wheel is broken, you need to restart it!
hud_heist_help_loud_04.loc_text: The wheel is broken, you need to restart it!

hud_heist_help_loud_05.base_text: You have survived the challenge, now claim your prize!
hud_heist_help_loud_05.loc_text: You have survived the challenge, now claim your prize!

hud_heist_help_loud_06.base_text: Use your keycard to activate the prison door panel or the escape panel.
hud_heist_help_loud_06.loc_text: Use your keycard to activate the prison door panel or the escape panel.

hud_heist_help_loud_07.base_text: The loot is pouring from the prison, try and secure as much as you can before time runs out!
hud_heist_help_loud_07.loc_text: The loot is pouring from the prison, try and secure as much as you can before time runs out!

hud_heist_help_loud_08.base_text: Pull the switch and escape now or forever be trapped in this nightmare.
hud_heist_help_loud_08.loc_text: Pull the switch and escape now or forever be trapped in this nightmare.

hud_heist_help_loud_10.base_text: Get to the ziplines by the tunnel entrance.
hud_heist_help_loud_10.loc_text: Get to the ziplines by the tunnel entrance.

hud_heist_help_loud_11.base_text: Use the zipline to reach the trains on the bridge.
hud_heist_help_loud_11.loc_text: Use the zipline to reach the trains on the bridge.

hud_heist_help_loud_12.base_text: Hold out while Bain sends in some C4 via helicopter.
hud_heist_help_loud_12.loc_text: Hold out while Bain sends in some C4 via helicopter.

hud_heist_help_loud_13.base_text: The only thing in your way now is the back door of the train. Blow it up using your C4!
hud_heist_help_loud_13.loc_text: The only thing in your way now is the back door of the train. Blow it up using your C4!

hud_heist_help_loud_14.base_text: Head towards the white light at the end of the bridge!
hud_heist_help_loud_14.loc_text: Head towards the white light at the end of the bridge!

hud_heist_hox0.base_text: Proceed further inside the FBI headquarters.
hud_heist_hox0.loc_text: Proceed further inside the FBI headquarters.

hud_heist_hox1.base_text: Find the Operations Room where the main FBI intelligence servers are kept.
hud_heist_hox1.loc_text: Find the Operations Room where the main FBI intelligence servers are kept.

hud_heist_hox1_1.base_text: Get Hoxton to the armored truck out on the street.
hud_heist_hox1_1.loc_text: Get Hoxton to the armored truck out on the street.

hud_heist_hox1_11.base_text: Remove the police stingers from the truck's path.
hud_heist_hox1_11.loc_text: Remove the police stingers from the truck's path.

hud_heist_hox1_12.base_text: Move the police car from the truck's path.
hud_heist_hox1_12.loc_text: Move the police car from the truck's path.

hud_heist_hox1_13.base_text: Move the SWAT van from the truck's path.
hud_heist_hox1_13.loc_text: Move the SWAT van from the truck's path.

hud_heist_hox1_14.base_text: Lower the road barriers from the truck's path.
hud_heist_hox1_14.loc_text: Lower the road barriers from the truck's path.

hud_heist_hox1_15.loc_text: Bridge the construction hole that is blocking the truck's path.

hud_heist_hox1_17.loc_text: We need to make the truck lighter. Remove the armor plating so you can escape.

hud_heist_hox1_4.base_text: Clear a path for the armored truck so it can continue.

hud_heist_hox1_9.loc_text: Use the hacked computer to lower the bollards, and allow the truck to continue.

hud_heist_hox2.loc_text: Hoxton needs access to the main FBI intelligence servers in the Operations Room. The servers have the information that you need.

hud_heist_hox4b.loc_text: Download the encryption keys from the Security Office servers so that Hoxton can access the encrypted FBI servers.

hud_heist_hox4c.loc_text: Bring the encryption keys to Hoxton so that he can continue searching through the FBI intelligence servers.

hud_heist_jerry01_00.base_text: Locke has supplied vital equipment in three crates. The crates are marked with a strobe light.
hud_heist_jerry01_00.loc_text: Locke has supplied vital equipment in three crates. The crates are marked with a strobe light.

hud_heist_jerry01_00_first_hl.loc_text: Get to the Black Ridge facility

hud_heist_jerry01_01.loc_text: Gather the equipment from the marked crates.

hud_heist_jerry01_10.base_text: Step inside the airlock. It leads to the inner complex.
hud_heist_jerry01_10.loc_text: Step inside the airlock. It leads to the inner complex.

hud_heist_jerry01_11.base_text: Get the whole crew into the airlock. It needs to close before the inner door opens.
hud_heist_jerry01_11.loc_text: Get the whole crew into the airlock. It needs to close before the inner door opens.

hud_heist_jerry01_12.base_text: Fight your way to the overhead control room.
hud_heist_jerry01_12.loc_text: Fight your way to the overhead control room.

hud_heist_jerry01_15.base_text: Attach a bag of loot to the zipline in the elevator shaft. Locke will keep it safe.
hud_heist_jerry01_15.loc_text: Attach a bag of loot to the zipline in the elevator shaft. Locke will keep it safe.

hud_heist_jerry01_16.base_text: Use ziplines in the elevator shaft to reach the surface. You can also stay and find more loot.
hud_heist_jerry01_16.loc_text: Use ziplines in the elevator shaft to reach the surface. You can also stay and find more loot.

hud_heist_jerry01_17.base_text: Join with Locke near the surface exit.
hud_heist_jerry01_17.loc_text: Join with Locke near the surface exit.

hud_heist_jerry01_18.base_text: Prevent your escape being tracked by using C4 to destroy Murkywater's radar and communication equipment.
hud_heist_jerry01_18.loc_text: Prevent your escape being tracked by using C4 to destroy Murkywater's radar and communication equipment.

hud_heist_jerry01_19.base_text: Secure the vault loot in the helicopter.
hud_heist_jerry01_19.loc_text: Secure the vault loot in the helicopter.

hud_heist_jerry01_19_hl.base_text: Get the vault loot to the helicopter
hud_heist_jerry01_19_hl.loc_text: Get the vault loot to the helicopter

hud_heist_jerry01_20.base_text: Use the refueling equipment to refuel the helicopter.
hud_heist_jerry01_20.loc_text: Use the refueling equipment to refuel the helicopter.

hud_heist_jerry01_22.base_text: Get in the helicopter and prepare for take off!
hud_heist_jerry01_22.loc_text: Get in the helicopter and prepare for take off!

hud_heist_jerry01_vault_loop_001.base_text: Use the control panel to select a vault to unlock first.
hud_heist_jerry01_vault_loop_001.loc_text: Use the control panel to select a vault to unlock first.

hud_heist_jerry01_vault_loop_001_hl.base_text: Select a vault to open first
hud_heist_jerry01_vault_loop_001_hl.loc_text: Select a vault to open first

hud_heist_jerry01_vault_loop_002.base_text: Continue using the control panel to unlock vaults and find loot.
hud_heist_jerry01_vault_loop_002.loc_text: Continue using the control panel to unlock vaults and find loot.

hud_heist_jerry02_01.base_text: Locate the money pallet that has landed somewhere in the town. Check the roofs and interiors.
hud_heist_jerry02_01.loc_text: Locate the money pallet that has landed somewhere in the town. Check the roofs and interiors.

hud_heist_jerry02_02.base_text: Locate the money pallet that has landed somewhere in the town. Check the roofs and interiors.
hud_heist_jerry02_02.loc_text: Locate the money pallet that has landed somewhere in the town. Check the roofs and interiors.

hud_heist_jerry02_03.base_text: Locate the money pallet that has landed somewhere in the town. Check the roofs and interiors.
hud_heist_jerry02_03.loc_text: Locate the money pallet that has landed somewhere in the town. Check the roofs and interiors.

hud_heist_jerry02_04.base_text: Find one of the sewer entrances in the town. Climb down, and fight to the exit.
hud_heist_jerry02_04.loc_text: Find one of the sewer entrances in the town. Climb down, and fight to the exit.

hud_heist_jerry02_05.base_text: Get all of the crew into the rubber boat!
hud_heist_jerry02_05.loc_text: Get all of the crew into the rubber boat!

hud_heist_jerry02_06.base_text: Drive the rubber boat along the sewers to reach Locke and the helicopter.
hud_heist_jerry02_06.loc_text: Drive the rubber boat along the sewers to reach Locke and the helicopter.

hud_heist_jerry02_airdrop_attach.base_text: Go to the money pallet and attach it to the helicopter.
hud_heist_jerry02_airdrop_attach.loc_text: Go to the money pallet and attach it to the helicopter.

hud_heist_jerry02_airdrop_gather.base_text: One of the money pallets has broken and cash is scattered about the town. Collect them and put them back on the pallet.
hud_heist_jerry02_airdrop_gather.loc_text: One of the money pallets has broken and cash is scattered about the town. Collect them and put them back on the pallet.

hud_heist_jerry02_airdrop_reignite.base_text: The cops have extinguished the flare. Get it lit again.
hud_heist_jerry02_airdrop_reignite.loc_text: The cops have extinguished the flare. Get it lit again.

hud_heist_jerry02_airdrop_signal.base_text: Locke's helicopter is waiting to collect the pallets. Ignite the flare to bring him in.
hud_heist_jerry02_airdrop_signal.loc_text: Locke's helicopter is waiting to collect the pallets. Ignite the flare to bring him in.

hud_heist_jerry02_airdrop_wait.base_text: Protect the flare. Cops will attempt to extinguish it.
hud_heist_jerry02_airdrop_wait.loc_text: Protect the flare. Cops will attempt to extinguish it.

hud_heist_jerry_plane_01.base_text: Climb up the ladder and enter the hold of this Murkywater cargo plane.
hud_heist_jerry_plane_01.loc_text: Climb up the ladder and enter the hold of this Murkywater cargo plane.

hud_heist_jerry_plane_02.base_text: Everything and everyone will be leaving through the cargo hold. Open the doors!
hud_heist_jerry_plane_02.loc_text: Everything and everyone will be leaving through the cargo hold. Open the doors!

hud_heist_jerry_plane_03.base_text: Make your way along the plane to reach the control panel on the upper deck.
hud_heist_jerry_plane_03.loc_text: Make your way along the plane to reach the control panel on the upper deck.

hud_heist_jerry_plane_04.base_text: Use the cargo controls to release the money pallets.
hud_heist_jerry_plane_04.loc_text: Use the cargo controls to release the money pallets.

hud_heist_jerry_plane_05.base_text: Your parachutes are stored close by. Get them. You will need them.
hud_heist_jerry_plane_05.loc_text: Your parachutes are stored close by. Get them. You will need them.

hud_heist_jerry_plane_06.base_text: Jump out of the cargo doors.
hud_heist_jerry_plane_06.loc_text: Jump out of the cargo doors.

hud_heist_kenaz_c_01.base_text: Find your way to the armory in guards' locker room. That is where you will collect the C4.
hud_heist_kenaz_c_01.loc_text: Find your way to the armory in guards' locker room. That is where you will collect the C4.

hud_heist_kenaz_c_02.base_text: Three different numbers form the access code for the armory. You need all of them. One is held by the manager, one by the pit boss and the other by the head of security.
hud_heist_kenaz_c_02.loc_text: Three different numbers form the access code for the armory. You need all of them. One is held by the manager, one by the pit boss and the other by the head of security.

hud_heist_kenaz_c_02_hl.base_text: Find three numbers for the armory code
hud_heist_kenaz_c_02_hl.loc_text: Find three numbers for the armory code

hud_heist_kenaz_c_03.base_text: Find two more numbers for the armory access code. One is held by the manager, one by the pit boss and the other by the head of security.
hud_heist_kenaz_c_03.loc_text: Find two more numbers for the armory access code. One is held by the manager, one by the pit boss and the other by the head of security.

hud_heist_kenaz_c_03_hl.base_text: Find two more numbers for the armory code
hud_heist_kenaz_c_03_hl.loc_text: Find two more numbers for the armory code

hud_heist_kenaz_c_04.base_text: Find the last number for the armory access code. One is held by the manager, one by the pit boss and the other by the head of security.
hud_heist_kenaz_c_04.loc_text: Find the last number for the armory access code. One is held by the manager, one by the pit boss and the other by the head of security.

hud_heist_kenaz_c_04_hl.base_text: Find the last number for the armory code
hud_heist_kenaz_c_04_hl.loc_text: Find the last number for the armory code

hud_heist_kenaz_c_05.base_text: Enter the three numbers into the armory security system. Remember to put them in in the correct order.
hud_heist_kenaz_c_05.loc_text: Enter the three numbers into the armory security system. Remember to put them in in the correct order.

hud_heist_kenaz_c_06.base_text: Set a drill up on the cage doors and wait for them to open.
hud_heist_kenaz_c_06.loc_text: Set a drill up on the cage doors and wait for them to open.

hud_heist_kenaz_c_07.base_text: Grab the C4 from the bag in the armory cage.
hud_heist_kenaz_c_07.loc_text: Grab the C4 from the bag in the armory cage.

hud_heist_kenaz_c_08.base_text: Plant C4 on the floor of the Gambling Hall. There are two spots. One of them will be the weak spot. There's enough C4 to blow both.
hud_heist_kenaz_c_08.loc_text: Plant C4 on the floor of the Gambling Hall. There are two spots. One of them will be the weak spot. There's enough C4 to blow both.

hud_heist_kenaz_c_08_hl.base_text: Plant the C4 in the Gambling Hall
hud_heist_kenaz_c_08_hl.loc_text: Plant the C4 in the Gambling Hall

hud_heist_kenaz_c_09.base_text: Bile is circling nearby. Light a signal flare to bring him in.
hud_heist_kenaz_c_09.loc_text: Bile is circling nearby. Light a signal flare to bring him in.

hud_heist_kenaz_c_10.base_text: Wait for Bile to arrive with the winch parts.
hud_heist_kenaz_c_10.loc_text: Wait for Bile to arrive with the winch parts.

hud_heist_kenaz_c_11.base_text: Bile has dropped the pieces for the winch. Go and grab them.
hud_heist_kenaz_c_11.loc_text: Bile has dropped the pieces for the winch. Go and grab them.

hud_heist_kenaz_c_12.base_text: Throw the bags at the indicated spot in the Gambling Hall to assemble the winch.
hud_heist_kenaz_c_12.loc_text: Throw the bags at the indicated spot in the Gambling Hall to assemble the winch.

hud_heist_kenaz_c_13.base_text: The winch needs to be secure. Screw it down to the floor.
hud_heist_kenaz_c_13.loc_text: The winch needs to be secure. Screw it down to the floor.

hud_heist_kenaz_c_14.base_text: Look for the fireworks in the storage room and take them.
hud_heist_kenaz_c_14.loc_text: Look for the fireworks in the storage room and take them.

hud_heist_kenaz_c_15.base_text: Place the fireworks at the indicated spot.
hud_heist_kenaz_c_15.loc_text: Place the fireworks at the indicated spot.

hud_heist_kenaz_c_16.base_text: Light the firework fuse and stand back!
hud_heist_kenaz_c_16.loc_text: Light the firework fuse and stand back!

hud_heist_kenaz_c_17.base_text: Open the Security Center door and get inside to open the skylight barrier.
hud_heist_kenaz_c_17.loc_text: Open the Security Center door and get inside to open the skylight barrier.

hud_heist_kenaz_c_18a.base_text: Open the skylight barrier by hacking the mechanism in the Security Center.
hud_heist_kenaz_c_18a.loc_text: Open the skylight barrier by hacking the mechanism in the Security Center.

hud_heist_kenaz_c_18b.base_text: Wait for the skylight barrier hack to finish.
hud_heist_kenaz_c_18b.loc_text: Wait for the skylight barrier hack to finish.

hud_heist_kenaz_c_20.base_text: The blimp carrying the drill is en-route. Wait for it.
hud_heist_kenaz_c_20.loc_text: The blimp carrying the drill is en-route. Wait for it.

hud_heist_kenaz_c_20_hl.base_text: Wait for the blimp to arrive
hud_heist_kenaz_c_20_hl.loc_text: Wait for the blimp to arrive

hud_heist_kenaz_c_21.base_text: The blimp is lowering the drill. Wait for it.
hud_heist_kenaz_c_21.loc_text: The blimp is lowering the drill. Wait for it.

hud_heist_kenaz_c_21_hl.base_text: Wait for the drill to lower
hud_heist_kenaz_c_21_hl.loc_text: Wait for the drill to lower

hud_heist_kenaz_c_22.base_text: Connect the winch hook to the drill.
hud_heist_kenaz_c_22.loc_text: Connect the winch hook to the drill.

hud_heist_kenaz_c_22_hl.base_text: Connect the winch to the BFD
hud_heist_kenaz_c_22_hl.loc_text: Connect the winch to the BFD

hud_heist_kenaz_c_23.base_text: The winch will move the BFD into the correct position. Start it up.
hud_heist_kenaz_c_23.loc_text: The winch will move the BFD into the correct position. Start it up.

hud_heist_kenaz_c_24.base_text: Wait for the winch to finish moving BFD into position above the vault.
hud_heist_kenaz_c_24.loc_text: Wait for the winch to finish moving BFD into position above the vault.

hud_heist_kenaz_c_24_hl.base_text: Wait for BFD to get into position
hud_heist_kenaz_c_24_hl.loc_text: Wait for BFD to get into position

hud_heist_kenaz_c_25.base_text: The cops have shut down the winch. Get it started again.
hud_heist_kenaz_c_25.loc_text: The cops have shut down the winch. Get it started again.

hud_heist_kenaz_c_26.base_text: BFD needs a lot of electricity. Hook her up to two power sockets.
hud_heist_kenaz_c_26.loc_text: BFD needs a lot of electricity. Hook her up to two power sockets.

hud_heist_kenaz_c_26_hl.base_text: Connect the power to the BFD
hud_heist_kenaz_c_26_hl.loc_text: Connect the power to the BFD

hud_heist_kenaz_c_27a.base_text: The BFD will drill down through the Gambling Hall and into the vault. Start her up!
hud_heist_kenaz_c_27a.loc_text: The BFD will drill down through the Gambling Hall and into the vault. Start her up!

hud_heist_kenaz_c_27b.base_text: The BFD is drilling into the vault. Wait for her, and keep the cops away.
hud_heist_kenaz_c_27b.loc_text: The BFD is drilling into the vault. Wait for her, and keep the cops away.

hud_heist_kenaz_c_28.base_text: The cops have shut down the BFD. Get her re-started.
hud_heist_kenaz_c_28.loc_text: The cops have shut down the BFD. Get her re-started.

hud_heist_kenaz_c_29.base_text: Reconnect the BFD to the power socket.
hud_heist_kenaz_c_29.loc_text: Reconnect the BFD to the power socket.

hud_heist_kenaz_c_30.base_text: The BFD needs a lot of coolant. Refill both water tanks
hud_heist_kenaz_c_30.loc_text: The BFD needs a lot of coolant. Refill both water tanks

hud_heist_kenaz_c_31.base_text: Looks like something messed up with the BFD. Take the tools and repair her.
hud_heist_kenaz_c_31.loc_text: Looks like something messed up with the BFD. Take the tools and repair her.

hud_heist_kenaz_c_32.base_text: The drill is done and the vault is ready. Get in there.
hud_heist_kenaz_c_32.loc_text: The drill is done and the vault is ready. Get in there.

hud_heist_kenaz_c_33a.base_text: You can now grab the loot for the Dentist. Look for a golden chest.
hud_heist_kenaz_c_33a.loc_text: You can now grab the loot for the Dentist. Look for a golden chest.

hud_heist_kenaz_c_33b.base_text: Grab the chest and get it back to the secure drop-off point.
hud_heist_kenaz_c_33b.loc_text: Grab the chest and get it back to the secure drop-off point.

hud_heist_kenaz_c_34.base_text: The loot is secure. Now escape the Golden Grin casino.
hud_heist_kenaz_c_34.loc_text: The loot is secure. Now escape the Golden Grin casino.

hud_heist_kenaz_s_01.base_text: Your gear will trigger metal detectors and set off the alarm. Your mask and guns have been stashed in a guitar case by Micho, the janitor. Find it. Grab the sleeping gas and poison too.
hud_heist_kenaz_s_01.loc_text: Your gear will trigger metal detectors and set off the alarm. Your mask and guns have been stashed in a guitar case by Micho, the janitor. Find it. Grab the sleeping gas and poison too.

hud_heist_kenaz_s_010a.base_text: Three different numbers form the access code for the vault. You need all of them. One is held by the manager, one by the pit boss and the other by the head of security.
hud_heist_kenaz_s_010a.loc_text: Three different numbers form the access code for the vault. You need all of them. One is held by the manager, one by the pit boss and the other by the head of security.

hud_heist_kenaz_s_010a_hl.base_text: Find three numbers for the vault code
hud_heist_kenaz_s_010a_hl.loc_text: Find three numbers for the vault code

hud_heist_kenaz_s_010b.base_text: Find two more numbers for the vault access code. One is held by the manager, one by the pit boss and the other by the head of security.
hud_heist_kenaz_s_010b.loc_text: Find two more numbers for the vault access code. One is held by the manager, one by the pit boss and the other by the head of security.

hud_heist_kenaz_s_010b_hl.base_text: Find two more numbers for the vault code
hud_heist_kenaz_s_010b_hl.loc_text: Find two more numbers for the vault code

hud_heist_kenaz_s_010c.base_text: Find the last number for the vault access code. One is held by the manager, one by the pit boss and the other by the head of security.
hud_heist_kenaz_s_010c.loc_text: Find the last number for the vault access code. One is held by the manager, one by the pit boss and the other by the head of security.

hud_heist_kenaz_s_010c_hl.base_text: Find the last number used for the vault code
hud_heist_kenaz_s_010c_hl.loc_text: Find the last number used for the vault code

hud_heist_kenaz_s_012a.base_text: Hack the computer to disable the lasers guarding the vault entrance.
hud_heist_kenaz_s_012a.loc_text: Hack the computer to disable the lasers guarding the vault entrance.

hud_heist_kenaz_s_012b.base_text: Enter the three numbers into the vault security system. Remember to put them in in the correct order.
hud_heist_kenaz_s_012b.loc_text: Enter the three numbers into the vault security system. Remember to put them in in the correct order.

hud_heist_kenaz_s_02.base_text: Find and access the Archives. Search the documents for the blueprint plans of the casino.
hud_heist_kenaz_s_02.loc_text: Find and access the Archives. Search the documents for the blueprint plans of the casino.

hud_heist_kenaz_s_02b.base_text: Find a scanner in the I.T.. Scan the blueprints and fax them over to Bain.
hud_heist_kenaz_s_02b.loc_text: Find a scanner in the I.T.. Scan the blueprints and fax them over to Bain.

hud_heist_kenaz_s_02b_hl.base_text: Scan the blueprints and fax them to Bain
hud_heist_kenaz_s_02b_hl.loc_text: Scan the blueprints and fax them to Bain

hud_heist_kenaz_s_03.base_text: We need to find who is staying in that guest room. Download the guest list onto the memory stick. You can acquire this list from a terminal in casino reception.
hud_heist_kenaz_s_03.loc_text: We need to find who is staying in that guest room. Download the guest list onto the memory stick. You can acquire this list from a terminal in casino reception.

hud_heist_kenaz_s_03a.base_text: Bain needs you to acquire hotel guest list. Copy it on memory stick and upload the data to him.  The best chance to find a memory stick is in the I.T. room.
hud_heist_kenaz_s_03a.loc_text: Bain needs you to acquire hotel guest list. Copy it on memory stick and upload the data to him.  The best chance to find a memory stick is in the I.T. room.

hud_heist_kenaz_s_03a_hl.base_text: Find and collect a memory stick
hud_heist_kenaz_s_03a_hl.loc_text: Find and collect a memory stick

hud_heist_kenaz_s_03b.base_text: Find a computer connected to the internet. Plug in the memory stick and upload the guest list to Bain.
hud_heist_kenaz_s_03b.loc_text: Find a computer connected to the internet. Plug in the memory stick and upload the guest list to Bain.

hud_heist_kenaz_s_04.base_text: Check the picture Bain sent you and find out the exact location of this guest. He is a slot machine addict, so he will probably be playing.
hud_heist_kenaz_s_04.loc_text: Check the picture Bain sent you and find out the exact location of this guest. He is a slot machine addict, so he will probably be playing.

hud_heist_kenaz_s_04_hl.base_text: Find the guest inside the Gambling Hall
hud_heist_kenaz_s_04_hl.loc_text: Find the guest inside the Gambling Hall

hud_heist_kenaz_s_05a.base_text: The guest's bottle is empty. Bring him a fresh one, spiked with the poison. Look for the bottles in the casino's bars and put poison in it. Remember to get the drink he likes.
hud_heist_kenaz_s_05a.loc_text: The guest's bottle is empty. Bring him a fresh one, spiked with the poison. Look for the bottles in the casino's bars and put poison in it. Remember to get the drink he likes.

hud_heist_kenaz_s_05a_hl.base_text: Find and spike the correct bottle
hud_heist_kenaz_s_05a_hl.loc_text: Find and spike the correct bottle

hud_heist_kenaz_s_06.base_text: Pour the spiked drink for the guest. Don't be stingy. This is Vegas, where everyone has a good time, so fill that glass up.
hud_heist_kenaz_s_06.loc_text: Pour the spiked drink for the guest. Don't be stingy. This is Vegas, where everyone has a good time, so fill that glass up.

hud_heist_kenaz_s_06_hl.base_text: Give the guest the spiked drink
hud_heist_kenaz_s_06_hl.loc_text: Give the guest the spiked drink

hud_heist_kenaz_s_07.base_text: The drink is now poisoned. Wait for chemistry and biology to do their work. When he runs for the bathroom, follow him. Deal with him in a remote spot.
hud_heist_kenaz_s_07.loc_text: The drink is now poisoned. Wait for chemistry and biology to do their work. When he runs for the bathroom, follow him. Deal with him in a remote spot.

hud_heist_kenaz_s_07_hl.base_text: Wait for the poison to work
hud_heist_kenaz_s_07_hl.loc_text: Wait for the poison to work

hud_heist_kenaz_s_08.base_text: The guest just lost the keycard. Collect it. You can use it to enter his room.
hud_heist_kenaz_s_08.loc_text: The guest just lost the keycard. Collect it. You can use it to enter his room.

hud_heist_kenaz_s_09.base_text: Use the keycard to get into the hotel room. Find the vent and start pumping sleeping gas into the shaft. This will put the guards in the Security Center to sleep.
hud_heist_kenaz_s_09.loc_text: Use the keycard to get into the hotel room. Find the vent and start pumping sleeping gas into the shaft. This will put the guards in the Security Center to sleep.

hud_heist_kenaz_s_09_hl.base_text: Pump the sleeping gas into ventilation
hud_heist_kenaz_s_09_hl.loc_text: Pump the sleeping gas into ventilation

hud_heist_kosugi.base_text: Steal as much from the depot as you can. Stay quiet.
hud_heist_kosugi.loc_text: Steal as much from the depot as you can. Stay quiet.

hud_heist_kosugiEnd.base_text: Get to the van to escape, or stay if you want to grab more loot.
hud_heist_kosugiEnd.loc_text: Get to the van to escape, or stay if you want to grab more loot.

hud_heist_mad_01.base_text: Disable the anti air system so that the plane can fly in and drop the EMP.
hud_heist_mad_01.loc_text: Disable the anti air system so that the plane can fly in and drop the EMP.

hud_heist_mad_01_hl.base_text: Find and disable the anti-air system
hud_heist_mad_01_hl.loc_text: Find and disable the anti-air system

hud_heist_mad_02.base_text: Get into the lumber yard where the EMP has been dropped.
hud_heist_mad_02.loc_text: Get into the lumber yard where the EMP has been dropped.

hud_heist_mad_03.base_text: Activate and protect the emp, it will take some time to charge
hud_heist_mad_03.loc_text: Activate and protect the emp, it will take some time to charge

hud_heist_mad_04.base_text: The EMP has opened the way down to the labs, get down there!
hud_heist_mad_04.loc_text: The EMP has opened the way down to the labs, get down there!

hud_heist_mad_05.base_text: There should be a scanner that we can use to scan the test subjects somewhere, find it
hud_heist_mad_05.loc_text: There should be a scanner that we can use to scan the test subjects somewhere, find it

hud_heist_mad_06.base_text: The EMP knocked out the test subjects, find them and get them to the scanner. They should be dressed in blue.
hud_heist_mad_06.loc_text: The EMP knocked out the test subjects, find them and get them to the scanner. They should be dressed in blue.

hud_heist_mad_06_hl.base_text: Find and scan a test subject
hud_heist_mad_06_hl.loc_text: Find and scan a test subject

hud_heist_mad_07.base_text: The mercs don't want you to scan those test subjects. Keep them off it!
hud_heist_mad_07.loc_text: The mercs don't want you to scan those test subjects. Keep them off it!

hud_heist_man1.base_text: Wait for Taxman to show the server we are after. Scare him into the limo when you see it - we need both the server and the taxman. Alex will lift him up to us from the open street. Also, keep an eye out for what you can use to better your chances.

hud_heist_tag06.base_text: Find and disable the security boxes which control Garrett's security panel.
hud_heist_tag06.loc_text: Find and disable the security boxes which control Garrett's security panel.

hud_heist_tag07.base_text: Enter Garrett's office by disabling the security panel by his door!
hud_heist_tag07.loc_text: Enter Garrett's office by disabling the security panel by his door!

hud_heist_tag08.base_text: Find the safe in Garrett's office.
hud_heist_tag08.loc_text: Find the safe in Garrett's office.

hud_heist_tag09.base_text: Search Garrett's office for the correct code to the safe!
hud_heist_tag09.loc_text: Search Garrett's office for the correct code to the safe!

hud_heist_tag10.base_text: Take the keycard from the safe and head to the evidence room!
hud_heist_tag10.loc_text: Take the keycard from the safe and head to the evidence room!

hud_heist_tag11.base_text: Find the evidence room located on the opposite side of the building.
hud_heist_tag11.loc_text: Find the evidence room located on the opposite side of the building.

hud_heist_tag11_hl.base_text: Find and enter the evidence room
hud_heist_tag11_hl.loc_text: Find and enter the evidence room

hud_heist_tag12.base_text: Find a use for the keycard inside the evidence room!
hud_heist_tag12.loc_text: Find a use for the keycard inside the evidence room!

hud_heist_tag13.base_text: Grab the Elephant Box and get out of there!
hud_heist_tag13.loc_text: Grab the Elephant Box and get out of there!

hud_heist_tag14.base_text: Make your way to the basement. Make sure everyone in your team, and the box, are inside the elevator!
hud_heist_tag14.loc_text: Make your way to the basement. Make sure everyone in your team, and the box, are inside the elevator!

hud_heist_tag15.base_text: Secure the box plus any additional loot!
hud_heist_tag15.loc_text: Secure the box plus any additional loot!

hud_heist_vit_1.base_text: Get inside the White House through one of the entrances.
hud_heist_vit_1.loc_text: Get inside the White House through one of the entrances.

hud_heist_vit_10.base_text: Find clues on how to access the safe! Browse through various laptops which can be found in the West Wing.
hud_heist_vit_10.loc_text: Find clues on how to access the safe! Browse through various laptops which can be found in the West Wing.

hud_heist_vit_11.base_text: Check the laptops for the location of the USB drive.
hud_heist_vit_11.loc_text: Check the laptops for the location of the USB drive.

hud_heist_vit_12.base_text: Plug the USB drive into a laptop to find out the code to the safe.
hud_heist_vit_12.loc_text: Plug the USB drive into a laptop to find out the code to the safe.

hud_heist_vit_13.base_text: Open the safe in the Oval Office!
hud_heist_vit_13.loc_text: Open the safe in the Oval Office!

hud_heist_vit_14.base_text: Grab the keycard from inside the safe!
hud_heist_vit_14.loc_text: Grab the keycard from inside the safe!

hud_heist_vit_15.base_text: Go back to the main wing and enter the library!
hud_heist_vit_15.loc_text: Go back to the main wing and enter the library!

hud_heist_vit_16.base_text: Access the P.E.O.C. from the library!
hud_heist_vit_16.loc_text: Access the P.E.O.C. from the library!

hud_heist_vit_17.base_text: Have a closer look at the vault door.
hud_heist_vit_17.loc_text: Have a closer look at the vault door.

hud_heist_vit_18.base_text: Help Locke hack the different stages of the mainframe to open the vault.
hud_heist_vit_18.loc_text: Help Locke hack the different stages of the mainframe to open the vault.

hud_heist_vit_19.base_text: Grab all of the 24 pardons from inside the vault!
hud_heist_vit_19.loc_text: Grab all of the 24 pardons from inside the vault!

hud_heist_vit_2.base_text: Make your way to the West Wing. According to the blueprints, access to it is on the ground floor.
hud_heist_vit_2.loc_text: Make your way to the West Wing. According to the blueprints, access to it is on the ground floor.

hud_heist_vit_20.base_text: Make your way out of the P.E.O.C.
hud_heist_vit_20.loc_text: Make your way out of the P.E.O.C.

hud_heist_vit_21.base_text: Disable the anti air defences so that Locke can pick you up.
hud_heist_vit_21.loc_text: Disable the anti air defences so that Locke can pick you up.

hud_heist_vit_22.base_text: Wait for Locke to arrive with the helicopter.
hud_heist_vit_22.loc_text: Wait for Locke to arrive with the helicopter.

hud_heist_vit_23.base_text: Get to the helicopter and escape!
hud_heist_vit_23.loc_text: Get to the helicopter and escape!

hud_heist_vit_3.base_text: Locate wire boxes and cut the colored cables. Make sure to cut the correct ones, or the alarm will go off!
hud_heist_vit_3.loc_text: Locate wire boxes and cut the colored cables. Make sure to cut the correct ones, or the alarm will go off!

hud_heist_vit_3_hl.base_text: Locate and cut the correct wires
hud_heist_vit_3_hl.loc_text: Locate and cut the correct wires

hud_heist_vit_4.base_text: Locate wire boxes and place a hacking device on the box with the correct wires.
hud_heist_vit_4.loc_text: Locate wire boxes and place a hacking device on the box with the correct wires.

hud_heist_vit_5.base_text: Continue moving towards the West Wing.
hud_heist_vit_5.loc_text: Continue moving towards the West Wing.

hud_heist_vit_6.base_text: Make your way into the Oval Office!
hud_heist_vit_6.loc_text: Make your way into the Oval Office!

hud_heist_vit_7.base_text: Find something to get through the Oval Office shutters with.
hud_heist_vit_7.loc_text: Find something to get through the Oval Office shutters with.

hud_heist_vit_7_hl.base_text: Find a way into the oval office
hud_heist_vit_7_hl.loc_text: Find a way into the oval office

hud_heist_vit_8.base_text: Place the Thermite paste on the Oval Office shutters.
hud_heist_vit_8.loc_text: Place the Thermite paste on the Oval Office shutters.

hud_heist_vit_9.base_text: There should be a hidden safe somewhere inside the Oval Office. Find it!
hud_heist_vit_9.loc_text: There should be a hidden safe somewhere inside the Oval Office. Find it!

hud_heist_wwh_01.base_text: Locke sold us out. The deal was a scam and swats are everywhere! Fight off the ambush!
hud_heist_wwh_01.loc_text: Locke sold us out. The deal was a scam and swats are everywhere! Fight off the ambush!

hud_heist_wwh_02.base_text: Locke seemed to have sold out the butcher as well. Free her men so we can get a ride with that ship.
hud_heist_wwh_02.loc_text: Locke seemed to have sold out the butcher as well. Free her men so we can get a ride with that ship.

hud_heist_wwh_03.base_text: We need that saw to free the captain of the ship. Grab it
hud_heist_wwh_03.loc_text: We need that saw to free the captain of the ship. Grab it

hud_heist_wwh_04.base_text: The captain is being held behind a locked garage door. Saw it open and free him.
hud_heist_wwh_04.loc_text: The captain is being held behind a locked garage door. Saw it open and free him.

hud_heist_wwh_04b.base_text: The captain will give you further instructions once he reaches the ship. Wait for him
hud_heist_wwh_04b.loc_text: The captain will give you further instructions once he reaches the ship. Wait for him

hud_heist_wwh_04b_hl.base_text: Wait for the captain to get to the boat
hud_heist_wwh_04b_hl.loc_text: Wait for the captain to get to the boat

hud_heist_wwh_05a.base_text: The ship needs more fuel for it to reach international waters. Drag a hose from the tank to the ship so we can start pumping fuel in to it.
hud_heist_wwh_05a.loc_text: The ship needs more fuel for it to reach international waters. Drag a hose from the tank to the ship so we can start pumping fuel in to it.

hud_heist_wwh_05a_hl.base_text: Connect the fuel hose to the ship
hud_heist_wwh_05a_hl.loc_text: Connect the fuel hose to the ship

hud_heist_wwh_05ab.base_text: Hose is connected. Now start the pump to get the process started.
hud_heist_wwh_05ab.loc_text: Hose is connected. Now start the pump to get the process started.

hud_heist_wwh_05b.base_text: Defend the tank and pump. Don't let swats interrupt either one.
hud_heist_wwh_05b.loc_text: Defend the tank and pump. Don't let swats interrupt either one.

hud_heist_wwh_05c.base_text: Remove the moorings holding the boat in place and detach the hose from the boat.
hud_heist_wwh_05c.loc_text: Remove the moorings holding the boat in place and detach the hose from the boat.

hud_heist_wwh_06a.base_text: Time to leave. Gather on the boat.
hud_heist_wwh_06a.loc_text: Time to leave. Gather on the boat.

hud_heist_wwh_06b.base_text: Remove the gangplanks and stop enemies from getting on the boat. We can't leave until the boat is empty of swats.
hud_heist_wwh_06b.loc_text: Remove the gangplanks and stop enemies from getting on the boat. We can't leave until the boat is empty of swats.

hud_heist_wwh_07.base_text: Time to leave with the boat.
hud_heist_wwh_07.loc_text: Time to leave with the boat.
