loading_gameplay_1.base_text: Listen to the Contract Broker - he will tell you what to do next.
loading_gameplay_1.loc_text: Listen to the Contract Broker - he will tell you what to do next.

loading_gameplay_10.base_text: You will get a bonus for every surviving crew member during the success screen.
loading_gameplay_10.loc_text: You will get a bonus for every surviving crew member during the success screen.

loading_gameplay_100.base_text: The damage of every arrow shot from a Bow will increase depending on how long you charged the shot.
loading_gameplay_100.loc_text: The damage of every arrow shot from a Bow will increase depending on how long you charged the shot.

loading_gameplay_101.base_text: Flashbangs can be destroyed after landing on the ground by shooting at them, or even by attacking them with a Melee weapon.
loading_gameplay_101.loc_text: Flashbangs can be destroyed after landing on the ground by shooting at them, or even by attacking them with a Melee weapon.

loading_gameplay_102.base_text: Some doors can be shot open by firing at their locks.
loading_gameplay_102.loc_text: Some doors can be shot open by firing at their locks.

loading_gameplay_103.base_text: In Casing Mode, you can still be detected, especially if you collide with guards, but the range at which guards will begin detecting you is greatly reduced.
loading_gameplay_103.loc_text: In Casing Mode, you can still be detected, especially if you collide with guards, but the range at which guards will begin detecting you is greatly reduced.

loading_gameplay_104.base_text: Civilians will not notice broken cameras or loot bags. However, they will notice Body Bags.
loading_gameplay_104.loc_text: Civilians will not notice broken cameras or loot bags. However, they will notice Body Bags.

loading_gameplay_105.base_text: Body Bags can be thrown into deep water or into dumpsters in order to safely hide them.
loading_gameplay_105.loc_text: Body Bags can be thrown into deep water or into dumpsters in order to safely hide them.

loading_gameplay_106.base_text: Police officers will not attempt to repossess loot that has not yet been bagged.
loading_gameplay_106.loc_text: Police officers will not attempt to repossess loot that has not yet been bagged.

loading_gameplay_107.base_text: Lasers will not damage you - but they will trigger the alarm.
loading_gameplay_107.loc_text: Lasers will not damage you - but they will trigger the alarm.

loading_gameplay_108.base_text: ECM Jammers might stop guards from sounding the alarm, but in many cases they also stop certain map objectives from being completed while they're active and should therefore be treated as a last resort.
loading_gameplay_108.loc_text: ECM Jammers might stop guards from sounding the alarm, but in many cases they also stop certain map objectives from being completed while they're active and should therefore be treated as a last resort.

loading_gameplay_109.base_text: ECM Jammers will temporarily convert SWAT Van Turrets to your side.
loading_gameplay_109.loc_text: ECM Jammers will temporarily convert SWAT Van Turrets to your side.

loading_gameplay_11.base_text: A low Detection Rate can be used in a gunfight with the Ghost Skill Tree. Just because someone's not wearing armor, doesn't mean they can't hold their own in a fight.
loading_gameplay_11.loc_text: A low Detection Rate can be used in a gunfight with the Ghost Skill Tree. Just because someone's not wearing armor, doesn't mean they can't hold their own in a fight.

loading_gameplay_110.base_text: The ECM Feedback function of ECM Jammers regenerates every 4 minutes.
loading_gameplay_110.loc_text: The ECM Feedback function of ECM Jammers regenerates every 4 minutes.

loading_gameplay_111.base_text: Holding the "Melee" button allows you to charge Melee weapons for a more powerful attack.
loading_gameplay_111.loc_text: Holding the "Melee" button allows you to charge Melee weapons for a more powerful attack.

loading_gameplay_112.base_text: Some enemies use body armor and you need to aim for their heads.
loading_gameplay_112.loc_text: Some enemies use body armor and you need to aim for their heads.

loading_gameplay_113.base_text: SWAT Van Turrets repair themselves twice -- each time after their shield breaks.
loading_gameplay_113.loc_text: SWAT Van Turrets repair themselves twice -- each time after their shield breaks.

loading_gameplay_114.base_text: The SWAT Van Turret's weakness is the reflective camera below the gun. Aim at it for maximum damage output.
loading_gameplay_114.loc_text: The SWAT Van Turret's weakness is the reflective camera below the gun. Aim at it for maximum damage output.

loading_gameplay_115.base_text: Most windows can be picked open. Breaking them will make lots of noise, and even civilians will be suspicious if they see broken glass.
loading_gameplay_115.loc_text: Most windows can be picked open. Breaking them will make lots of noise, and even civilians will be suspicious if they see broken glass.

loading_gameplay_116.base_text: If you break a window, try to find planks to cover it with, to fool any passing guards and civilians.
loading_gameplay_116.loc_text: If you break a window, try to find planks to cover it with, to fool any passing guards and civilians.

loading_gameplay_117.base_text: Even suppressed saws make a little bit of noise. Be wary of nearby people.
loading_gameplay_117.loc_text: Even suppressed saws make a little bit of noise. Be wary of nearby people.

loading_gameplay_118.base_text: Un-tied civilians will get back up and run off if left unattended. Use your Cable ties to avoid it.
loading_gameplay_118.loc_text: Un-tied civilians will get back up and run off if left unattended. Use your Cable ties to avoid it.

loading_gameplay_119.base_text: The Ace of Spades Throwable is silent. Grenades are not. Prepare accordingly when you're planning to be sneaky.
loading_gameplay_119.loc_text: The Ace of Spades Throwable is silent. Grenades are not. Prepare accordingly when you're planning to be sneaky.

loading_gameplay_12.base_text: Know your enemy. Cloakers have distinct green, glowing night vision goggles on, and make a noise when they're charging at you. You can also hear a static noise when they arrive at the scene.
loading_gameplay_12.loc_text: Know your enemy. Cloakers have distinct green, glowing night vision goggles on, and make a noise when they're charging at you. You can also hear a static noise when they arrive at the scene.

loading_gameplay_120.base_text: ECM Jammers temporarily disable cameras. Don't be afraid to use one to blind the Camera Operator when you're in a tight spot.
loading_gameplay_120.loc_text: ECM Jammers temporarily disable cameras. Don't be afraid to use one to blind the Camera Operator when you're in a tight spot.

loading_gameplay_121.base_text: Cameras can't detect noise, but they'll still sound the alarm if they see suspicious activity for too long.
loading_gameplay_121.loc_text: Cameras can't detect noise, but they'll still sound the alarm if they see suspicious activity for too long.

loading_gameplay_122.base_text: If a camera sees suspicious activity, there's no stopping the alarm.
loading_gameplay_122.loc_text: If a camera sees suspicious activity, there's no stopping the alarm.

loading_gameplay_123.base_text: Melee weapons are always silent. If you don't have a suppressor, this is your best friend for silent takedowns.
loading_gameplay_123.loc_text: Melee weapons are always silent. If you don't have a suppressor, this is your best friend for silent takedowns.

loading_gameplay_124.base_text: Guards will be able to tell you're behind them if you get too close. Keep some distance when you're tailing them.
loading_gameplay_124.loc_text: Guards will be able to tell you're behind them if you get too close. Keep some distance when you're tailing them.

loading_gameplay_125.base_text: Most guns reload faster when you have bullets left in the clip.
loading_gameplay_125.loc_text: Most guns reload faster when you have bullets left in the clip.

loading_gameplay_126.base_text: For as long as Captain Winters is present, the police will not stop the assault.
loading_gameplay_126.loc_text: For as long as Captain Winters is present, the police will not stop the assault.

loading_gameplay_127.base_text: The "Threat" weapon stat indicates the chance of cops avoiding fire and searching cover when you fire your gun. The higher the number, the more threatening the weapon is per shot
loading_gameplay_127.loc_text: The "Threat" weapon stat indicates the chance of cops avoiding fire and searching cover when you fire your gun. The higher the number, the more threatening the weapon is per shot

loading_gameplay_128.base_text: Almost all drills have a chance to break on their own. Be sure to keep a close eye on them.
loading_gameplay_128.loc_text: Almost all drills have a chance to break on their own. Be sure to keep a close eye on them.

loading_gameplay_129.base_text: Purchasing Assets in the Loadout or Preplanning screen can be a great help during the heist. Study them closely.
loading_gameplay_129.loc_text: Purchasing Assets in the Loadout or Preplanning screen can be a great help during the heist. Study them closely.

loading_gameplay_13.base_text: Know your enemy. The Medic wears bright red clothes and can quickly be identified in a crowd.
loading_gameplay_13.loc_text: Know your enemy. The Medic wears bright red clothes and can quickly be identified in a crowd.

loading_gameplay_130.base_text: When one of your teammates has been downed, ask the rest of your team to cover you while you revive him.
loading_gameplay_130.loc_text: When one of your teammates has been downed, ask the rest of your team to cover you while you revive him.

loading_gameplay_131.base_text: While sawing doors and deposit boxes is the fastest way to open them - it's also very loud. Use the silent motor to reduce its noise.
loading_gameplay_131.loc_text: While sawing doors and deposit boxes is the fastest way to open them - it's also very loud. Use the silent motor to reduce its noise.

loading_gameplay_132.base_text: You get detected easier if you are carrying a bag.
loading_gameplay_132.loc_text: You get detected easier if you are carrying a bag.

loading_gameplay_133.base_text: Hostages are your lifelines. Keep them secured, away from the action, and away from cops.
loading_gameplay_133.loc_text: Hostages are your lifelines. Keep them secured, away from the action, and away from cops.

loading_gameplay_134.base_text: Trip mines can be placed anywhere, such as vents where Cloakers spawn, or a room you don't want cops to enter.
loading_gameplay_134.loc_text: Trip mines can be placed anywhere, such as vents where Cloakers spawn, or a room you don't want cops to enter.

loading_gameplay_135.base_text: Be careful of tossing Grenades at cops. They can easily shoot it out of the air.
loading_gameplay_135.loc_text: Be careful of tossing Grenades at cops. They can easily shoot it out of the air.

loading_gameplay_136.base_text: Every Civilian you kill extends the amount of time you spend in jail while Bain works on trying to get you out.
loading_gameplay_136.loc_text: Every Civilian you kill extends the amount of time you spend in jail while Bain works on trying to get you out.

loading_gameplay_137.base_text: Cloakers are immune to ECM feedback.
loading_gameplay_137.loc_text: Cloakers are immune to ECM feedback.

loading_gameplay_138.base_text: If you're the last one standing - staying alive has much more importance than the objective.
loading_gameplay_138.loc_text: If you're the last one standing - staying alive has much more importance than the objective.

loading_gameplay_139.base_text: Shotguns can take down multiple cops in a single shot. Aim for a crowd and fire away.
loading_gameplay_139.loc_text: Shotguns can take down multiple cops in a single shot. Aim for a crowd and fire away.

loading_gameplay_14.base_text: Know your enemy. There are two different kinds of Shields units, some are equipped with lights and SMGs, and the others carries a pistol.
loading_gameplay_14.loc_text: Know your enemy. There are two different kinds of Shields units, some are equipped with lights and SMGs, and the others carries a pistol.

loading_gameplay_140.base_text: Sniper Rifles can shoot through Shields and armor, and even multiple enemies.
loading_gameplay_140.loc_text: Sniper Rifles can shoot through Shields and armor, and even multiple enemies.

loading_gameplay_141.base_text: Enemies will see you from far away if you are standing up. Crouch to stay out of their view.
loading_gameplay_141.loc_text: Enemies will see you from far away if you are standing up. Crouch to stay out of their view.

loading_gameplay_15.base_text: Know your enemy. The ZEAL units all wear urban camouflage, making it harder to identify who has additional armor.
loading_gameplay_15.loc_text: Know your enemy. The ZEAL units all wear urban camouflage, making it harder to identify who has additional armor.

loading_gameplay_16.base_text: Know your enemy. Tasers can be identified by their dark blue and yellow armor.
loading_gameplay_16.loc_text: Know your enemy. Tasers can be identified by their dark blue and yellow armor.

loading_gameplay_17.base_text: Know your enemy. The Snipers give away their position by their laser sights.
loading_gameplay_17.loc_text: Know your enemy. The Snipers give away their position by their laser sights.

loading_gameplay_18.base_text: Know your enemy. The SWAT turret can be identified by being attached to a huge SWAT van.
loading_gameplay_18.loc_text: Know your enemy. The SWAT turret can be identified by being attached to a huge SWAT van.

loading_gameplay_19.base_text: Perk Decks can change the way you play drastically. Choose one that fits your playstyle.
loading_gameplay_19.loc_text: Perk Decks can change the way you play drastically. Choose one that fits your playstyle.

loading_gameplay_2.base_text: Are you low on ammo? Look around on the ground, because dead cops drop ammo boxes.
loading_gameplay_2.loc_text: Are you low on ammo? Look around on the ground, because dead cops drop ammo boxes.

loading_gameplay_20.base_text: The Medic Skill Subtree is all about keeping you and your fellow heisters healthy and alive.
loading_gameplay_20.loc_text: The Medic Skill Subtree is all about keeping you and your fellow heisters healthy and alive.

loading_gameplay_21.base_text: The Controller Skill Subtree is focused on capturing and controlling hostages. Including law enforcers.
loading_gameplay_21.loc_text: The Controller Skill Subtree is focused on capturing and controlling hostages. Including law enforcers.

loading_gameplay_22.base_text: The Sharpshooter Skill Subtree specializes in sniping with a single accurate shot.
loading_gameplay_22.loc_text: The Sharpshooter Skill Subtree specializes in sniping with a single accurate shot.

loading_gameplay_23.base_text: The Shotgunner Skill Subtree provides massive boosts when using Shotguns.
loading_gameplay_23.loc_text: The Shotgunner Skill Subtree provides massive boosts when using Shotguns.

loading_gameplay_24.base_text: The Tank Skill Subtree makes you stronger and more resilient.
loading_gameplay_24.loc_text: The Tank Skill Subtree makes you stronger and more resilient.

loading_gameplay_25.base_text: The Ammo Specialist Skill Subtree is focused around ammunition. It also has skills to improve the OVE9000 Saw.
loading_gameplay_25.loc_text: The Ammo Specialist Skill Subtree is focused around ammunition. It also has skills to improve the OVE9000 Saw.

loading_gameplay_26.base_text: The Engineer Skill Subtree is primarily focused around the use of Sentry Guns.
loading_gameplay_26.loc_text: The Engineer Skill Subtree is primarily focused around the use of Sentry Guns.

loading_gameplay_27.base_text: The Breacher Skill Subtree focuses on opening doors, safes, and vaults quickly. It also upgrades the Trip Mines.
loading_gameplay_27.loc_text: The Breacher Skill Subtree focuses on opening doors, safes, and vaults quickly. It also upgrades the Trip Mines.

loading_gameplay_28.base_text: The Oppressor Skill Subtree focuses boost your auto-fire weapons, making them even more effective.
loading_gameplay_28.loc_text: The Oppressor Skill Subtree focuses boost your auto-fire weapons, making them even more effective.

loading_gameplay_29.base_text: The Artful Dodger Skill Subtree focuses on speed, and the ability to dodge gunfire if you have good Concealment.
loading_gameplay_29.loc_text: The Artful Dodger Skill Subtree focuses on speed, and the ability to dodge gunfire if you have good Concealment.

loading_gameplay_3.base_text: Special Enemies are gradually introduced for each difficulty from hard and above.
loading_gameplay_3.loc_text: Special Enemies are gradually introduced for each difficulty from hard and above.

loading_gameplay_30.base_text: The Shinobi Skill Subtree make Stealth easier, but also comes with tricks to be used when the alarm is triggered.
loading_gameplay_30.loc_text: The Shinobi Skill Subtree make Stealth easier, but also comes with tricks to be used when the alarm is triggered.

loading_gameplay_31.base_text: The Gunslinger Skill Subtree specializes in Pistols.
loading_gameplay_31.loc_text: The Gunslinger Skill Subtree specializes in Pistols.

loading_gameplay_32.base_text: The Revenant Skill Subtree is all about survival during worst case scenarios.
loading_gameplay_32.loc_text: The Revenant Skill Subtree is all about survival during worst case scenarios.

loading_gameplay_33.base_text: The Feign Death Skill in the Revenant Skill Subtree gives you a chance to get back up on your own after getting downed.
loading_gameplay_33.loc_text: The Feign Death Skill in the Revenant Skill Subtree gives you a chance to get back up on your own after getting downed.

loading_gameplay_34.base_text: The Brawler Skill Subtree focuses on Melee weapons. Be it fists, knives, or any other melee attack.
loading_gameplay_34.loc_text: The Brawler Skill Subtree focuses on Melee weapons. Be it fists, knives, or any other melee attack.

loading_gameplay_35.base_text: Don't leave bags unattended - cops may be inclined to steal your precious loot.
loading_gameplay_35.loc_text: Don't leave bags unattended - cops may be inclined to steal your precious loot.

loading_gameplay_36.base_text: While getting tased by a Taser, try shooting the Taser in order to free yourself.
loading_gameplay_36.loc_text: While getting tased by a Taser, try shooting the Taser in order to free yourself.

loading_gameplay_37.base_text: It's often faster to swap to your fully loaded Secondary weapon then attempt to reload your Primary weapon.
loading_gameplay_37.loc_text: It's often faster to swap to your fully loaded Secondary weapon then attempt to reload your Primary weapon.

loading_gameplay_38.base_text: Saws use ammo quickly. Bring Ammo Bags to increase their usage.
loading_gameplay_38.loc_text: Saws use ammo quickly. Bring Ammo Bags to increase their usage.

loading_gameplay_39.base_text: Red outlines around an enemy during a Loud heist indicates that they are a Special Enemy of some sorts.
loading_gameplay_39.loc_text: Red outlines around an enemy during a Loud heist indicates that they are a Special Enemy of some sorts.

loading_gameplay_4.base_text: Gage Mod Courier Packages will grant the team a free EXP bonus, regardless if they own the Gage Mod Courier DLC or not.
loading_gameplay_4.loc_text: Gage Mod Courier Packages will grant the team a free EXP bonus, regardless if they own the Gage Mod Courier DLC or not.

loading_gameplay_40.base_text: If you're playing by yourself, without Team-AI or other players - Cloakers won't charge you.
loading_gameplay_40.loc_text: If you're playing by yourself, without Team-AI or other players - Cloakers won't charge you.

loading_gameplay_41.base_text: Cops are more easily intimidated if they are by themselves.
loading_gameplay_41.loc_text: Cops are more easily intimidated if they are by themselves.

loading_gameplay_43.base_text: Bulldozers have a plate that protect their faces. You need to shoot away the plate before you can hand out headshots.
loading_gameplay_43.loc_text: Bulldozers have a plate that protect their faces. You need to shoot away the plate before you can hand out headshots.

loading_gameplay_44.base_text: Tasing an enemy makes them a lot easier to Dominate.
loading_gameplay_44.loc_text: Tasing an enemy makes them a lot easier to Dominate.

loading_gameplay_45.base_text: Tasers can pin down your teammates, kill the Taser to help your teammates.
loading_gameplay_45.loc_text: Tasers can pin down your teammates, kill the Taser to help your teammates.

loading_gameplay_46.base_text: Enemy Snipers deal massive amount of damage that can wipe all of your armor and take a part of your health in one shot.
loading_gameplay_46.loc_text: Enemy Snipers deal massive amount of damage that can wipe all of your armor and take a part of your health in one shot.

loading_gameplay_47.base_text: A silencer is very helpful when trying to sneakily complete a heist so your gunshot can't be heard.
loading_gameplay_47.loc_text: A silencer is very helpful when trying to sneakily complete a heist so your gunshot can't be heard.

loading_gameplay_48.base_text: Some weapons have alternate Fire Modes, where you can switch between single-fire and auto-fire.
loading_gameplay_48.loc_text: Some weapons have alternate Fire Modes, where you can switch between single-fire and auto-fire.

loading_gameplay_49.base_text: Marking Special Enemies makes it easier for your teammates to identify them.
loading_gameplay_49.loc_text: Marking Special Enemies makes it easier for your teammates to identify them.

loading_gameplay_5.base_text: The higher the Threat Level of your weapons, the more likely it is that enemies will try to dodge.
loading_gameplay_5.loc_text: The higher the Threat Level of your weapons, the more likely it is that enemies will try to dodge.

loading_gameplay_50.base_text: Mind your surroundings, if you kill a Civilian you will pay a penalty from your spending cash.
loading_gameplay_50.loc_text: Mind your surroundings, if you kill a Civilian you will pay a penalty from your spending cash.

loading_gameplay_51.base_text: Destroying a camera after you got detected won't stop the alarm.
loading_gameplay_51.loc_text: Destroying a camera after you got detected won't stop the alarm.

loading_gameplay_52.base_text: Guards may come over and investigate broken cameras - so don't shoot cameras if you can avoid it.
loading_gameplay_52.loc_text: Guards may come over and investigate broken cameras - so don't shoot cameras if you can avoid it.

loading_gameplay_53.base_text: You can press the "Shout/Interact" button to try to force a police officer to surrender and become a hostage.
loading_gameplay_53.loc_text: You can press the "Shout/Interact" button to try to force a police officer to surrender and become a hostage.

loading_gameplay_54.base_text: Is your screen turning grey? You should probably use a Doctor Bag.
loading_gameplay_54.loc_text: Is your screen turning grey? You should probably use a Doctor Bag.

loading_gameplay_55.base_text: A Doctor Bag will refill your lives and a First Aid Kit will only refill your health.
loading_gameplay_55.loc_text: A Doctor Bag will refill your lives and a First Aid Kit will only refill your health.

loading_gameplay_56.base_text: If your teammates have been taken into custody you need a hostage or a dominated cop to be able to trade and get your teammate back.
loading_gameplay_56.loc_text: If your teammates have been taken into custody you need a hostage or a dominated cop to be able to trade and get your teammate back.

loading_gameplay_57.base_text: You can't trade a hostage during an assault, you need to wait until the assault is over.
loading_gameplay_57.loc_text: You can't trade a hostage during an assault, you need to wait until the assault is over.

loading_gameplay_58.base_text: Doctor Bags will give three lives back, if you only been downed once it's better to use a First Aid Kit.
loading_gameplay_58.loc_text: Doctor Bags will give three lives back, if you only been downed once it's better to use a First Aid Kit.

loading_gameplay_59.base_text: Watch out for Cloakers - they attack when you least expect it. So beware of their sound.
loading_gameplay_59.loc_text: Watch out for Cloakers - they attack when you least expect it. So beware of their sound.

loading_gameplay_6.base_text: Guards will become suspicious about a destroyed camera. Civilians, on the other hand, don't care.
loading_gameplay_6.loc_text: Guards will become suspicious about a destroyed camera. Civilians, on the other hand, don't care.

loading_gameplay_60.base_text: Play with your teammates and support them - on your own, you stand less of a chance to survive.
loading_gameplay_60.loc_text: Play with your teammates and support them - on your own, you stand less of a chance to survive.

loading_gameplay_61.base_text: Bulldozers can't be stunned or staggered in any way.
loading_gameplay_61.loc_text: Bulldozers can't be stunned or staggered in any way.

loading_gameplay_62.base_text: If a Cloaker is charging at you - aim at his head.
loading_gameplay_62.loc_text: If a Cloaker is charging at you - aim at his head.

loading_gameplay_63.base_text: Cloakers are not affected by the Feedback Loop of an ECM Jammer.
loading_gameplay_63.loc_text: Cloakers are not affected by the Feedback Loop of an ECM Jammer.

loading_gameplay_64.base_text: After shooting with any type of bow, don't forget to pick up your arrows.
loading_gameplay_64.loc_text: After shooting with any type of bow, don't forget to pick up your arrows.

loading_gameplay_65.base_text: Some heists can be completed in Stealth without alerting the guards.
loading_gameplay_65.loc_text: Some heists can be completed in Stealth without alerting the guards.

loading_gameplay_66.base_text: Do you find it hard to find ammo boxes when you are out of ammo? You can turn on outlines for ammo, arrows and Throwables in the settings menu.
loading_gameplay_66.loc_text: Do you find it hard to find ammo boxes when you are out of ammo? You can turn on outlines for ammo, arrows and Throwables in the settings menu.

loading_gameplay_67.base_text: Sniper Rifles can penetrate thin walls. Use this to your advantage.
loading_gameplay_67.loc_text: Sniper Rifles can penetrate thin walls. Use this to your advantage.

loading_gameplay_68.base_text: Ammunition is more important than you think. Prioritize Special Enemies, such as Medics, Cloakers, Tasers and Bulldozers.
loading_gameplay_68.loc_text: Ammunition is more important than you think. Prioritize Special Enemies, such as Medics, Cloakers, Tasers and Bulldozers.

loading_gameplay_69.base_text: Getting close to enemies can cause them to deal a powerful melee attack.
loading_gameplay_69.loc_text: Getting close to enemies can cause them to deal a powerful melee attack.

loading_gameplay_7.base_text: Just because you're not masked up, doesn't mean you're invisible. Civilians might not be able to tell you're packing heat, but guards and cameras will.
loading_gameplay_7.loc_text: Just because you're not masked up, doesn't mean you're invisible. Civilians might not be able to tell you're packing heat, but guards and cameras will.

loading_gameplay_70.base_text: Bulldozers can come charging at you when you least expect it. Stay on your toes.
loading_gameplay_70.loc_text: Bulldozers can come charging at you when you least expect it. Stay on your toes.

loading_gameplay_71.base_text: A skilled Mastermind can convert cops to your side by first taking them hostage.
loading_gameplay_71.loc_text: A skilled Mastermind can convert cops to your side by first taking them hostage.

loading_gameplay_72.base_text: When your armor is low, take cover, it will regenerate over a short time and you will stay alive longer.
loading_gameplay_72.loc_text: When your armor is low, take cover, it will regenerate over a short time and you will stay alive longer.

loading_gameplay_73.base_text: Killing cops is important, but you can't complete a heist without clearing objectives.
loading_gameplay_73.loc_text: Killing cops is important, but you can't complete a heist without clearing objectives.

loading_gameplay_74.base_text: Don't hurry in Stealth, take your time and let the guards pass you.
loading_gameplay_74.loc_text: Don't hurry in Stealth, take your time and let the guards pass you.

loading_gameplay_75.base_text: Going for optional loot usually gives you more experience and money.
loading_gameplay_75.loc_text: Going for optional loot usually gives you more experience and money.

loading_gameplay_76.base_text: Getting kicked by a Cloaker or tased by Taser does not count towards your total amount times you are allowed to go down.
loading_gameplay_76.loc_text: Getting kicked by a Cloaker or tased by Taser does not count towards your total amount times you are allowed to go down.

loading_gameplay_77.base_text: Sensor mines are useful for keeping track of guards in Stealth.
loading_gameplay_77.loc_text: Sensor mines are useful for keeping track of guards in Stealth.

loading_gameplay_78.base_text: Keep an eye out for current objectives in the top left corner.
loading_gameplay_78.loc_text: Keep an eye out for current objectives in the top left corner.

loading_gameplay_79.base_text: If you are gonna defend an area it might be a good idea to plant some equipment for your team.
loading_gameplay_79.loc_text: If you are gonna defend an area it might be a good idea to plant some equipment for your team.

loading_gameplay_8.base_text: You can't put away your guns and mask once you've masked up. Don't mask up until you're ready for action.
loading_gameplay_8.loc_text: You can't put away your guns and mask once you've masked up. Don't mask up until you're ready for action.

loading_gameplay_80.base_text: Look around you and check if your teammates have placed equipment nearby. It is usually not as beneficial to place all equipment in the same place.
loading_gameplay_80.loc_text: Look around you and check if your teammates have placed equipment nearby. It is usually not as beneficial to place all equipment in the same place.

loading_gameplay_81.base_text: The Medics can heal other enemies - so take them out before they get the chance to.
loading_gameplay_81.loc_text: The Medics can heal other enemies - so take them out before they get the chance to.

loading_gameplay_82.base_text: Flashbangs will beep and blink red before they detonate.
loading_gameplay_82.loc_text: Flashbangs will beep and blink red before they detonate.

loading_gameplay_83.base_text: Stick together to increase survivability. Or split up to do objectives faster.
loading_gameplay_83.loc_text: Stick together to increase survivability. Or split up to do objectives faster.

loading_gameplay_84.base_text: Remember a lone player is an easy target for Cloakers.
loading_gameplay_84.loc_text: Remember a lone player is an easy target for Cloakers.

loading_gameplay_85.base_text: Using Feedback on an ECM Jammer can stun some cops in the vicinity for a short duration.
loading_gameplay_85.loc_text: Using Feedback on an ECM Jammer can stun some cops in the vicinity for a short duration.

loading_gameplay_86.base_text: Use cover, the enemies can quickly take you down if you are out in the open.
loading_gameplay_86.loc_text: Use cover, the enemies can quickly take you down if you are out in the open.

loading_gameplay_87.base_text: Almost every Stealth heist has a Camera Operator, be sure to kill him so cameras are no longer a problem.
loading_gameplay_87.loc_text: Almost every Stealth heist has a Camera Operator, be sure to kill him so cameras are no longer a problem.

loading_gameplay_88.base_text: Be careful where you place your bags, if a guard or a civilian sees it, they will sound the alarm.
loading_gameplay_88.loc_text: Be careful where you place your bags, if a guard or a civilian sees it, they will sound the alarm.

loading_gameplay_89.base_text: ECM Jammers will block the guard's radios, civilian cellphones and cameras so they can't alert the cops to your presence while the ECM jammer is active.
loading_gameplay_89.loc_text: ECM Jammers will block the guard's radios, civilian cellphones and cameras so they can't alert the cops to your presence while the ECM jammer is active.

loading_gameplay_9.base_text: Loot isn't divided between players in the lobby. Everyone gets the full amount.
loading_gameplay_9.loc_text: Loot isn't divided between players in the lobby. Everyone gets the full amount.

loading_gameplay_90.base_text: Some guards have a set patrol during Stealth, use this to your advantage.
loading_gameplay_90.loc_text: Some guards have a set patrol during Stealth, use this to your advantage.

loading_gameplay_91.base_text: Don't leave bodies around in Stealth, use a Body Bag to move them where they can't be seen.
loading_gameplay_91.loc_text: Don't leave bodies around in Stealth, use a Body Bag to move them where they can't be seen.

loading_gameplay_92.base_text: Don't run out of cover without checking if Snipers are present as they could deplete your health even with a full armor.
loading_gameplay_92.loc_text: Don't run out of cover without checking if Snipers are present as they could deplete your health even with a full armor.

loading_gameplay_93.base_text: To easily dominate a cop, try to deal some damage before shouting at them.
loading_gameplay_93.loc_text: To easily dominate a cop, try to deal some damage before shouting at them.

loading_gameplay_94.base_text: Crouching will help you avoid detection in Stealth.
loading_gameplay_94.loc_text: Crouching will help you avoid detection in Stealth.

loading_gameplay_95.base_text: Killing a guard in a cam room will let you freely roam without worrying about the cameras - but roaming guards still can detect you.
loading_gameplay_95.loc_text: Killing a guard in a cam room will let you freely roam without worrying about the cameras - but roaming guards still can detect you.

loading_gameplay_96.base_text: When Captain Winters is present he makes all enemies tougher to kill the longer he is present, including himself.
loading_gameplay_96.loc_text: When Captain Winters is present he makes all enemies tougher to kill the longer he is present, including himself.

loading_gameplay_97.base_text: Captain Winters will retreat when he has taken enough damage or if several of his men have fallen.
loading_gameplay_97.loc_text: Captain Winters will retreat when he has taken enough damage or if several of his men have fallen.

loading_gameplay_98.base_text: You have a small chance to obtain one Cable Tie upon an ammo pickup.
loading_gameplay_98.loc_text: You have a small chance to obtain one Cable Tie upon an ammo pickup.

loading_gameplay_99.base_text: Shotgun AP Rounds will pierce through both Shields and cops' armor.
loading_gameplay_99.loc_text: Shotgun AP Rounds will pierce through both Shields and cops' armor.

loading_heister_10.base_text: If you want to admire your weapon while in a heist, you can inspect it by pressing "INSPECT WEAPON" button.
loading_heister_10.loc_text: If you want to admire your weapon while in a heist, you can inspect it by pressing "INSPECT WEAPON" button.

loading_heister_11.base_text: Got a gadget? Turn it on by pressing the "GADGET ON/OFF" button.
loading_heister_11.loc_text: Got a gadget? Turn it on by pressing the "GADGET ON/OFF" button.

loading_heister_12.base_text: If you want a challenge, or just want to have some fun, you can activate some Mutators.
loading_heister_12.loc_text: If you want a challenge, or just want to have some fun, you can activate some Mutators.

loading_heister_13.base_text: Do not try this in real life.
loading_heister_13.loc_text: Do not try this in real life.

loading_heister_14.base_text: If you are joining a stealthable heist, ask if it's OK to join before pressing "Ready".
loading_heister_14.loc_text: If you are joining a stealthable heist, ask if it's OK to join before pressing "Ready".

loading_heister_15.base_text: You can't shoot your teammates with regular bullets. Unless you have the "Friendly Fire" Mutator turned on.
loading_heister_15.loc_text: You can't shoot your teammates with regular bullets. Unless you have the "Friendly Fire" Mutator turned on.

loading_heister_16.base_text: On Crime.net you can bet your Offshore money for an "Offshore Payday".
loading_heister_16.loc_text: On Crime.net you can bet your Offshore money for an "Offshore Payday".

loading_heister_17.base_text: Some achievements unlock Weapons, Mods or Masks.
loading_heister_17.loc_text: Some achievements unlock Weapons, Mods or Masks.

loading_heister_18.base_text: If you are new to the game you might want to try out the tutorial heists - they can be found on Crime.net.
loading_heister_18.loc_text: If you are new to the game you might want to try out the tutorial heists - they can be found on Crime.net.

loading_heister_19.base_text: Your weapons, skills, armor and Perk Deck all interact differently - take the time to read about their effects.
loading_heister_19.loc_text: Your weapons, skills, armor and Perk Deck all interact differently - take the time to read about their effects.

loading_heister_2.base_text: You can use the FBI files from the game menu to read about your teammates.
loading_heister_2.loc_text: You can use the FBI files from the game menu to read about your teammates.

loading_heister_20.base_text: The game has several difficulty levels. Find one that fits you.
loading_heister_20.loc_text: The game has several difficulty levels. Find one that fits you.

loading_heister_21.base_text: More loot means more rewards but could also mean higher risk.
loading_heister_21.loc_text: More loot means more rewards but could also mean higher risk.

loading_heister_22.base_text: Looking for a weapon mod? Do the Daily Tasks found in the Safe House.
loading_heister_22.loc_text: Looking for a weapon mod? Do the Daily Tasks found in the Safe House.

loading_heister_23.base_text: Remember to check the Perk Decks frequently to spend Perk Points.
loading_heister_23.loc_text: Remember to check the Perk Decks frequently to spend Perk Points.

loading_heister_24.base_text: A good team will have both Ammo Bags and Doctor Bags with them on the heist.
loading_heister_24.loc_text: A good team will have both Ammo Bags and Doctor Bags with them on the heist.

loading_heister_25.base_text: Take a look at all the stats of a weapon. High damage is not always the most efficient depending on your playstyle.
loading_heister_25.loc_text: Take a look at all the stats of a weapon. High damage is not always the most efficient depending on your playstyle.

loading_heister_26.base_text: Different Perk Decks have different effects and attributes. Try them all to see which Perk Deck suits you the best.
loading_heister_26.loc_text: Different Perk Decks have different effects and attributes. Try them all to see which Perk Deck suits you the best.

loading_heister_27.base_text: Don't expect that your heist will be the same if you replay it as vaults, assets and key items are randomized and will be at different locations each time you play it.
loading_heister_27.loc_text: Don't expect that your heist will be the same if you replay it as vaults, assets and key items are randomized and will be at different locations each time you play it.

loading_heister_28.base_text: Communicate with your teammates - teamwork is key to survival.
loading_heister_28.loc_text: Communicate with your teammates - teamwork is key to survival.

loading_heister_29.base_text: You can easily tell how many uses a placed Doctor Bag has left by looking at the amount of blood bags left inside the bag.
loading_heister_29.loc_text: You can easily tell how many uses a placed Doctor Bag has left by looking at the amount of blood bags left inside the bag.

loading_heister_3.base_text: Join the PAYDAY 2 community on the Steam Store Page to gain access to some extra free and unique content.
loading_heister_3.loc_text: Join the PAYDAY 2 community on the Steam Store Page to gain access to some extra free and unique content.

loading_heister_30.base_text: Shield units can block bullets, try to work together to flank them or use armor piercing bullets.
loading_heister_30.loc_text: Shield units can block bullets, try to work together to flank them or use armor piercing bullets.

loading_heister_31.base_text: Cleaner Costs are immediately deducted from your Spending Cash, so restarting a heist will not revert Cleaner Costs.
loading_heister_31.loc_text: Cleaner Costs are immediately deducted from your Spending Cash, so restarting a heist will not revert Cleaner Costs.

loading_heister_32.base_text: Right clicking whilst zoomed in with a Bow weapon will cancel your shot.
loading_heister_32.loc_text: Right clicking whilst zoomed in with a Bow weapon will cancel your shot.

loading_heister_33.base_text: Many weapons have an extended reload time if there are no bullets left in the magazine.
loading_heister_33.loc_text: Many weapons have an extended reload time if there are no bullets left in the magazine.

loading_heister_34.base_text: You don't need to own a DLC heist to be able to play it. You can't host lobbies that are playing that DLC heist unless you own the DLC.
loading_heister_34.loc_text: You don't need to own a DLC heist to be able to play it. You can't host lobbies that are playing that DLC heist unless you own the DLC.

loading_heister_35.base_text: If the escape is available, remember to leave when you think it's best. All that money won't be worth it if you get thrown into custody.
loading_heister_35.loc_text: If the escape is available, remember to leave when you think it's best. All that money won't be worth it if you get thrown into custody.

loading_heister_36.base_text: While in the Loadout screen, take a look at the "crew setup" to see what equipment your teammates are bringing.
loading_heister_36.loc_text: While in the Loadout screen, take a look at the "crew setup" to see what equipment your teammates are bringing.

loading_heister_37.base_text: If you see a little ghost symbol next to a heist on Crime.net, the mission can be completed in Stealth. If there isn't one, you can only do it Loud.
loading_heister_37.loc_text: If you see a little ghost symbol next to a heist on Crime.net, the mission can be completed in Stealth. If there isn't one, you can only do it Loud.

loading_heister_38.base_text: Hector's jobs are mostly about violence. Dress for a fight, and bring a big gun.
loading_heister_38.loc_text: Hector's jobs are mostly about violence. Dress for a fight, and bring a big gun.

loading_heister_39.base_text: The Elephant will reward you for doing things quietly, but going loud is an option when in a pinch.
loading_heister_39.loc_text: The Elephant will reward you for doing things quietly, but going loud is an option when in a pinch.

loading_heister_4.base_text: Two players doing the same interaction (eg. picking a lock) doesn't make the interaction go any faster.
loading_heister_4.loc_text: Two players doing the same interaction (eg. picking a lock) doesn't make the interaction go any faster.

loading_heister_40.base_text: Vlad's jobs will offer a mix of Stealth and Loud combat, be ready for anything.
loading_heister_40.loc_text: Vlad's jobs will offer a mix of Stealth and Loud combat, be ready for anything.

loading_heister_41.base_text: Profiles allow you to save your Loadout in order for you to quickly adjust your gear to the situation when being in the Loadout screen.
loading_heister_41.loc_text: Profiles allow you to save your Loadout in order for you to quickly adjust your gear to the situation when being in the Loadout screen.

loading_heister_42.base_text: Some bags are heavier than others. Make sure that the player with the lowest armor carries the heaviest bag and vice versa.
loading_heister_42.loc_text: Some bags are heavier than others. Make sure that the player with the lowest armor carries the heaviest bag and vice versa.

loading_heister_43.base_text: When in Stealth, consider if you need to bring Body Bags or ECM Jammers to better fit your team´s composition
loading_heister_43.loc_text: When in Stealth, consider if you need to bring Body Bags or ECM Jammers to better fit your team´s composition

loading_heister_44.base_text: Maximum Force Responders are outfitted with tan or gray body armor. Most weapons won't penetrate it, so aim for the head or flank them.
loading_heister_44.loc_text: Maximum Force Responders are outfitted with tan or gray body armor. Most weapons won't penetrate it, so aim for the head or flank them.

loading_heister_45.base_text: ZEAL units are the toughest that the DHS has to offer, and are deployed only at the Death Sentence difficulty.
loading_heister_45.loc_text: ZEAL units are the toughest that the DHS has to offer, and are deployed only at the Death Sentence difficulty.

loading_heister_46.base_text: Know your enemy. There are three kinds of Bulldozers: Green, Black, and Skulldozers. Each wields a different weapon.
loading_heister_46.loc_text: Know your enemy. There are three kinds of Bulldozers: Green, Black, and Skulldozers. Each wields a different weapon.

loading_heister_47.base_text: Shields will often come in groups, make sure you have a plan to deal with them.
loading_heister_47.loc_text: Shields will often come in groups, make sure you have a plan to deal with them.

loading_heister_48.base_text: You can select up to four preferred heisters, in case one of them is already taken by another player.
loading_heister_48.loc_text: You can select up to four preferred heisters, in case one of them is already taken by another player.

loading_heister_49.base_text: Combat is rarely the motive, but rather the method.
loading_heister_49.loc_text: Combat is rarely the motive, but rather the method.

loading_heister_5.base_text: Bain will offer smaller jobs that can be completed both Loud or in Stealth. They can often be done quick and he has a few good jobs for beginners.
loading_heister_5.loc_text: Bain will offer smaller jobs that can be completed both Loud or in Stealth. They can often be done quick and he has a few good jobs for beginners.

loading_heister_50.base_text: Skill points can be reallocated with no cost. Experiment and test for yourself.
loading_heister_50.loc_text: Skill points can be reallocated with no cost. Experiment and test for yourself.

loading_heister_51.base_text: It is better to have multiple Skill Sets that are good at different things, than to have one Skill Set that tries to do a bit of everything.
loading_heister_51.loc_text: It is better to have multiple Skill Sets that are good at different things, than to have one Skill Set that tries to do a bit of everything.

loading_heister_52.base_text: While on Crime.net the more skulls the server or heist has under its name the higher the difficulty.
loading_heister_52.loc_text: While on Crime.net the more skulls the server or heist has under its name the higher the difficulty.

loading_heister_6.base_text: Double the fun. Use Akimbo weapons to wield two pistols or SMGs.
loading_heister_6.loc_text: Double the fun. Use Akimbo weapons to wield two pistols or SMGs.

loading_heister_7.base_text: Remember to check your Safe House regularly, you never know what could happen.
loading_heister_7.loc_text: Remember to check your Safe House regularly, you never know what could happen.

loading_heister_8.base_text: Visit the FBI files to read about the Payday Gang, Special Enforcers and the Heists.
loading_heister_8.loc_text: Visit the FBI files to read about the Payday Gang, Special Enforcers and the Heists.

loading_heister_9.base_text: If Bain screams that someone is in a pickle - your teammates needs help.
loading_heister_9.loc_text: If Bain screams that someone is in a pickle - your teammates needs help.

loading_trivia_1.base_text: The Butcher's Gun Trade business reaches all around the globe. She has her eyes on one-of-a-kind weaponry to steal and she knows how to settle a score.
loading_trivia_1.loc_text: The Butcher's Gun Trade business reaches all around the globe. She has her eyes on one-of-a-kind weaponry to steal and she knows how to settle a score.

loading_trivia_10.base_text: Jacket likes his collection of Melee weapons.
loading_trivia_10.loc_text: Jacket likes his collection of Melee weapons.

loading_trivia_11.base_text: Scarface likes his Safe House room but keeps dreaming of a mansion in Miami.
loading_trivia_11.loc_text: Scarface likes his Safe House room but keeps dreaming of a mansion in Miami.

loading_trivia_13.base_text: Scarface is proud of his Cuban origins even though he often professes his dislike of the island.
loading_trivia_13.loc_text: Scarface is proud of his Cuban origins even though he often professes his dislike of the island.

loading_trivia_14.base_text: Scarface spends a fortune on furniture and decorations.
loading_trivia_14.loc_text: Scarface spends a fortune on furniture and decorations.

loading_trivia_16.base_text: Hoxton spends a fortune on beer.
loading_trivia_16.loc_text: Hoxton spends a fortune on beer.

loading_trivia_17.base_text: Hoxton is still annoyed at Houston for taking over his old mask and name.
loading_trivia_17.loc_text: Hoxton is still annoyed at Houston for taking over his old mask and name.

loading_trivia_18.base_text: Hoxton got his nickname from being arrested in the district of Hoxton, Shoreditch, London.
loading_trivia_18.loc_text: Hoxton got his nickname from being arrested in the district of Hoxton, Shoreditch, London.

loading_trivia_19.base_text: Sydney spends a fortune on art materials.
loading_trivia_19.loc_text: Sydney spends a fortune on art materials.

loading_trivia_2.base_text: Jimmy is crazy. Really crazy. He offers a few jobs against Akan and his army of Russian mercenaries.
loading_trivia_2.loc_text: Jimmy is crazy. Really crazy. He offers a few jobs against Akan and his army of Russian mercenaries.

loading_trivia_20.base_text: Sydney's hair is not natural blue.
loading_trivia_20.loc_text: Sydney's hair is not natural blue.

loading_trivia_21.loc_text: Sydney's old street gang, the Dingos, are still operating back in Melbourne.

loading_trivia_22.base_text: Sydney is a pretty good swimmer.
loading_trivia_22.loc_text: Sydney is a pretty good swimmer.

loading_trivia_23.base_text: John Wick really likes his car.
loading_trivia_23.loc_text: John Wick really likes his car.

loading_trivia_24.base_text: John Wick once killed three men in a bar. With a pencil.
loading_trivia_24.loc_text: John Wick once killed three men in a bar. With a pencil.

loading_trivia_25.loc_text: John Wick is sometimes called Baba Yaga, after a Slavic folklore figure.

loading_trivia_26.base_text: John Wick is back. He's definitely back.
loading_trivia_26.loc_text: John Wick is back. He's definitely back.

loading_trivia_27.loc_text: Bain's favorite color might be blue. But maybe it isn't. Maybe it's red. Maybe he doesn't have one.

loading_trivia_28.loc_text: Bain doesn't approve of needless killing of civilians.

loading_trivia_29.loc_text: Bain spends a fortune on bribes and informants.

loading_trivia_3.loc_text: Jimmy never gets to drive the escape van.

loading_trivia_30.loc_text: Everyone knows Bain's name. No one knows his identity.

loading_trivia_31.loc_text: Dallas spends a fortune on nice suits.

loading_trivia_32.loc_text: Dallas is the informal leader of the Payday Gang.

loading_trivia_34.loc_text: Dallas doesn't like going to the dentist.

loading_trivia_35.loc_text: Wolf spends a fortune on power tools.

loading_trivia_36.loc_text: Wolf used to work as a game developer in Sweden.

loading_trivia_37.loc_text: Wolf is not a healthy human being.

loading_trivia_39.loc_text: Bodhi spends a fortune on surfboards.

loading_trivia_4.loc_text: Jimmy once challenged Bonnie to a drinking competition, but they had to interrupt after it nearly ended in violence.

loading_trivia_40.base_text: Bodhi used to be a member of a gang called the Ex-Presidents.
loading_trivia_40.loc_text: Bodhi used to be a member of a gang called the Ex-Presidents.
